title: Can not use line control when operation?
content: Please check if your smart phone need to turn on OTG function manually, if yes, turn on OTG in phone setting.

title: Can not connect Thunderbolt?
content: Do not search and pair the device in the Bluetooth device scan list. The app will request to turn on the Bluetooth if it is not already on.

title: Can not connect Thunderbolt while starting APP?
content: Make sure if you turn on Bluetooth and OTG. Iphone user need to turn on Bluetooth manually, partial Android user need to turn on OTG manually.

title: What part of body can be used?
content: You can use in area of which the body feels uncomfortable. (Apart heart, the parts are mentioned in safety instructions ). Do not use in same position for a long time.

title: Uncomfortable feeling when using electrode pad?
content: Skin stains and grease will change the characteristics of pads, and cause abnormal or uncomfortable feeling. Suggest to replace new pads.

title: Even when set to a stronger power level, stimulation is weak or cannot be felt?
content: Please re-position the pads, and ensure the pad paste as close to the skin as possible always.

title: Needle feeling when using?
content: Try to start with lower intensity until the muscle adapt to the stimulation or move the position to avoid applying on injured body part.

title: If the pads lost their adhesiveness?
content: Wash the adhesive surface of the pads with running water and shake off any water, place the pads with their adhesive surfaces facing up, then let the surfaces air dry. If the pads still lost adhesiveness, suggest to replace new pads.
